scripts.build:prod: npm run webpack:prod && npm run imageopt && npm run cssnano && npm run compress
scripts.webpack:dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development npx webpack --progress && npm run inject-scripts
scripts.webpack:prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --progress && npm run inject-scripts
scripts.compress: npm run gzip && npm run brotli
scripts.cssnano: echo "Minifying CSS..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*.css' -exec npx cssnano {} {} \;
scripts.imageopt: echo "Optimizing images..." && npm run imageopt:png && npm run imageopt:webp-png
scripts.imageopt:webp-png: echo "Converting PNGs to lossless WebP..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*.png' | xargs -P 8 -I {} sh -c 'npx cwebp -quiet -lossless -q 100 -z 9 -m 6 $1 -o "${1%.png}.webp"' _ {} \;
scripts.imageopt:png: echo "Optimizing PNGs..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*.png' | xargs -P 8 -I {} sh -c 'npx pngquant --force --skip-if-larger --output $1 --speed 1 --strip $1' _ {} \;
scripts.analyze: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --profile --progress --json > bundle-stats.json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer bundle-stats.json
scripts.audit: npm run build && npx bundle-buddy dist/js/*.map
